dialogue.text: Hello Jane! Why the deep sigh?
Sylvia found out about the broken fishing rod and won't share her delicious fish dish with me for at least a week!
But I neeeeeed it so badly! I can feel the delicious taste of fish fading away from my taste buds!
Hurry! Bring me 3 floatish before the taste is totally gone! I'll give you some gelplant seeds!
